title: Unable to Log In?
body:
I'm currently unable to log in after I type in my credentials. It's just been sitting there with the loading bar   forever. I've tried restarting the client, booting it as admin etc but to no avail.

Any one else unable to log in?

replies.body: i feel like this isnt a league problem and more an issue with isp as i cant play pirate kings on facebook either. are you guys all from nz by any chance?
Yeah im in North Auckland
same, i don't know whats happening with my internet (or league) but i would enjoy playing today
Yeah im in dunedin i cant get on either but everything else is working fine. ie twitch ect.
same issue down here in Wellington, it was working last night at 1am - the loading bar is killing me

Hey guys can you comment in this thread with your computer specs and also ISP?

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/pb7xIBwV-login-not-working
Spark in Auckland cant log in either
i'm able to login again but cant connect to chat???
i'm able to login again but cant connect to chat???
yay im back on
its back on for me {{summoner:31}} {{champion:412}}

Same for me in Orewa (North Auckland)
- Spark VDSL, Cant log in
Well isn't this retarded. TrustPower here.

Same for me in Hamilton
- With Spark (VDSL connection), indefinite loading
- Using Vodafone (Mobile Data Connection), it works
Tried 2 different Modems, Same result
Different Devices, Same result


Last known time of working (Last time online) : 10:20pm 17-7-15 (+12hr Time Zone)
Current Time (Not working) : 2:50pm 18-7-15

Specs :
Gigabyte Z68AP-D3
I7-2600
16gb (4*4) Kingston Value
3Gb EVGA GTX 780Ti SC
Windows 8.1
120Gb Samsung 840 Evo
1Tb Seagate Barracuda 7200RPM SATA3

* Also side note : Cant log into socialclub either for GTA Online (Thx Spark 4 stopping me playing games)

EDIT : Appears to be fixed as of 3:08
Got the same problem in Palmerston North. I'm on Orcon VDSL.
Yup having the same issue, Auckland. Spark... probably trying to save bandwidth the budget bastards.{{champion:36}}
I have the same problem, but I can play on NA server.
Same problem. With bigpipe (fibre). Have repaired client and restarted router as well as computer several times. No luck. I'm in East Auckland.{{champion:32}}
Still happening...
yep same issue, spark tga
same problem with worldnet
Yeah Im with spark in Wellington.
I can't login and its really bugging me because i would really enjoy playing some ranked, but I'm stuck on the "logging in" screen with the loading animation.{{item:1328}}
On spark NZ. same problem here
Im on trust power i think but we did recently change from spark so maybe we havent properly changed over yet
yeah see im with vodafone and its working fine
spark op
It's the same situation here (Orcon Fiber)
Yup spark as well in south auckland, might have something to do with the weather, prob wanna find something else to do, will be weeks before they fix, useless as ever.
same
same thing, thought it was because I was on a mac (yes i know i use mac)
Having the same problem
same here
Yeah the server has just seemed to die all of a sudden. My friend can't log in and I can't queue up.
